Description: *** Price Lowered *** Guitar ( Shandra I ) was hand made for Ralph Santolla ( R.I.P ) - Lead guitar for many metal bandsDesigned and crafted by Divine Sound Customs of France. They make other Shandras, but this is the ONLYShandra I that will be. Please read the specifications I am including ( complete with translation quirks )from DSC website -- Also please check DSC Guitars website to see their other excellent guitars.After the Shandra was given to Ralph Santolla for promotional considerations, it ended up in the hands of a25+ Million record selling player ( I prefer to respect his privacy in this posting ) I bought this from him about amonth before Ralph Santolla passed away. I have been in touch with the Luthier who made this and he was very excited to hear of its journey: He will certainly be a great asset to the new owner.Plays and Sounds better than Great ... like a Custom Guitar --- Here are as much as I can fit from DSC ( Translated )Model ' Shandra ' Supreme A / Signature Ralph SantollaThis Model was originally designed fir the guitarist Ralph Santolla ( Death / Deicide / Obituary ) in January 2008.- Corp ( body ) 2 parts Khaya Mahogany Colas- Handle ( neck ) Mahogany glued- Nut 42mm- Key ( frets) 24 boxes- Custom PAUA Abalone Inly ' Cat's Teeth'- Pickups: KAMI Pickups / Wasabi Bridge / No PAF neck- Bridge / Tailpiece : Gotoh- Controls: 2 volumes / 1 tone + 2 splits pickups- Finish: Translucid Purple waxedGreat used condition. The horns have taken some hits and some arm wear on the body.But make no mistake - This is a one of a kind, Quality Instrument.Plenty of pics ( more available - including Ralph holding the guitar when he first got it )) - please ask questions Shipping quoted to lower 48 -Will ship internationally please contact for quote
Title: DSC Custom hand made Flying V  -1 of a kind.
